  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_387</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Representación de curvas</string>
            <string language="en">Drawing graphs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichnende Diagramme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Graphiques de dessin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gráficos desenhando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Grafici dissipanti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραφικές παραστάσεις σχεδίων</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones la representación gráfica de funciones elementales. Se estudian, a partir de ejemplos, funciones polinómicas, racionales, irracionales, exponenciales y logarítmicas.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to represent the graphs of elementary functions with examples of polynomial, rational, irrational, exponential and logarithmic functions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">exponencial</string>
            <string language="en">exponential</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">polinomio</string>
            <string language="en">polynomial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">irracional</string>
            <string language="en">irrational</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">racional</string>
            <string language="en">rational</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">gráfica</string>
            <string language="en">graph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">logarítmica</string>
            <string language="en">logarithmic</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, die Diagramme der grundlegenden Funktionen mit 
Beispielen der polynomischen, rationalen, vernunftwidrigen, 
exponentialen und logarithmischen Funktionen darzustellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de représenter les graphiques des fonctions 
élémentaires avec des exemples des fonctions polynômes, 
raisonnables, irrationnelles, exponentielles et logarithmiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações representar
os gráficos de funções elementares com os exemplos de funções 
polynomial, racionais, irrational, exponenciais e logarítmicas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
rappresentare i grafici delle funzioni elementari con gli esempi delle
funzioni polinomiali, razionali, irrazionali, esponenziali e 
logaritmiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να αντιπροσωπεύσει τις γραφικές παραστάσεις των στοιχειωδών 
λειτουργιών με τα παραδείγματα των πολυωνυμικών, λογικών, 
παράλογων, εκθετικών και λογαριθμικών λειτουργιών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">exponential</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">polynomisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
